Description.Text: The Capsis hotel offers great quality in a good central location and excellent service, all componenets of a well known brand that is getting better and better as years go by like good wine. (05/08 EP)

One of the most famous hotels of the city right in the heart of Thessaloniki, on Egnatia the central road which runs from the entrance to the exit of the city. It is ideally situated for the extensive shopping offered in Thessaloniki, just a short walk to the port and the fashionable Ladadika restaurant area. It is the largest and one of the grandest hotels in northern Greece.

The Club rooms have been recently renovated to a very high standard in a contemporary Greek style with particular attention to detail. They are medium in size and well maintained. Facilities include: air conditioning, television with satellite channels,radio, mini bar and hairdryer.
The hotel is modern in design from the outside, and has undergone extensive internal renovations in recent years.
The main restaurant is located on the first floor and offers a wide selection of International and Greek cuisine.

A beautiful, large impressive lobby with wonderful use of marble and huge chandeliers, the lobby has been extremely tastefully designed and includes an ample and comfortable bar area. There is also a business centre with internet etc just off the lobby.

Message.Text: Important notices: In case of any amendment please contact us to check the rates and conditions as these could change - Hotel will invoice the total amount of this booking in case of no show / En caso de modificacion, por favor contacten con nosotros para verificar las tarifas y condiciones de la reserva ya que podrian ser diferentes - En caso de no show el hotel se reserva el derecho de aplicar gastos del 100%
